website_summaries.verdict: This training shoe from Asics impressed a significant number of purchasers with its lightweight construction, comfortable fit, and stylish look. It performed admirably in a variety of training activities. However, not all purchasers were satisfied with the product. The lack of upper support and the unusual tongue design put off some of them. But the overall feedback on the shoe was more on the positive side.
pros: A significant number of athletes stated that the Asics Gel Fit Yui was competent during HIIT, circuit training, plyometrics, Zumba, and Jazzercise sessions
The comfort provided by the trainer was immensely lauded by people who spent long hours standing
It also pleased many training enthusiasts with its lightweight and breathable nature
Several wearers welcomed the padding around the ankles
A user mentioned that the outsole handled the twists and turns of dance-based workouts very well
Another reviewer appreciated the fact that the trainer was easy to put on and take off
cons: There were complaints about the tongue, which appeared to be too small that it left gaps on the sides
The mesh upper failed to provide sufficient support for several users
A handful of reviewers warned that the orange color in the picture turned out to be bright pink or red on the actual shoe
The laces were too long, as stated by a few testers

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, just a couple minor things I wish I would have known
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 9 and they fit true to size! One thing I wish I would have realized was that the sides do not give lots of support, I use them for jazzercise and wish I had more side support. Aldo, I didn't even pay attention to this so I can maybe help someone else. The lace holes are actually elastic, so I'm curious to see just how long they last. Others say they are more pink than the color shown, I would have to agree. Overall I really like this shoe, just some things I wish I would have realized. Also, the company I used was great.
customer_reviews.author: ssane93

customer_reviews.title: Color of shoe not the same as photo - but still a good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: These seem great but I am returning for a smaller size. I typically wear 9.5 in any type/brand of athletic shoe but I definitely need a 9 in these. This is my first time buying Asics so no review points off for the sizing since it's not their fault. Giving 4 stars instead of 5 because the color of the peach-looking shoe I ordered is much different in person. It's definitely hot pink. The image here is drastically less saturated, making the overall coloring misleading. I'm going to keep/exchange the shoes because they feel great and the color is not a deal breaker. Regardless, the seller should have an accurate photo posted.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C. Kadzis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for light lifting and cross-training
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers! I used to lift in my running shoes, which was a terrible rookie mistake. I'm so happy I purchased these- squats, burpees, box jumps, etc. are all far easier and feel much better on my feet and shins. The fit is closer to a normal tennis shoe than my fit for a running shoe (which I size up to account for swelling). Some people commented on the length of the laces but I haven't had an issue; I tie a double knot and everything fits just fine. I would recommend these to a friend looking for shoes to lift in.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Well-cushioned and so comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love ASICS shoes and this style is a favorite. I have them in blue and in black. The black pair feels a tiny bit snugger than the blue ones, but it’s not a problem for me. The outstanding detail is the COMFORT! The boot is slightly more structured than the other ASICS style I have (Gel-Fit Sana), but it’s totally flexible and comfortable. This style is well-cushioned and I wear them happily from morning till night. The Mono-Boot style ASICS uses in some of its styles would be excellent an addition to this one too.
customer_reviews.author: redheads4ever

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and cute. They are perfect for my indoor exercise classes. I ordered the black/white/silver and they are true to size. However, for the price I was disappointed that within two weeks of wear the silver began to rub off, leaving white spots on the sole. I would hope that shoes for this price would hold up a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Just May

customer_reviews.title: Arch pains.
customer_reviews.text: My review might not affect your foot. 1. The shoe isn't designed for a regular or wide foot. My foot isn't narrow, so when lacing the shoe, the tongue isn't wide enough to cover my sock. Minor detail. 2. I hate arches that are irregularly placed inside a shoe (which is why I can't wear a lot of Nikes). I never had an issue with other Asics running shoes - but during a workout, I could feel a hump pushing into the arch of my foot. Very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Mauve

customer_reviews.title: Not for hiking or running- these are rather like wearing outdoor slippers
customer_reviews.text: Really soft shoe and very soft sole rubber (almost too soft). Not for hiking or running- these are rather like wearing outdoor slippers. The laces are a slightly elastic but seem ok for just general wear to work and the store. These shoes may not be my most durable, but really really comfy. Sized perfectly: -i wear a 4.5 to 5.0 & solid B width.
customer_reviews.author: Claudette Earl

customer_reviews.title: extra cushion around ankle so the shoe can be worn without socks if you like. I wear 61/2 - 7 normally
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is light weight, extra cushion around ankle so the shoe can be worn without socks if you like. I wear 61/2 - 7 normally, depending on shoe and cut. I wouldn't use it for running more than a couple of miles, but perfect for plyo, drills and workouts.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: and are extremely comfortable. I have narrow feet and the laces allow ...
customer_reviews.text: Color is more hot pink than coral, as shown in the photo. These shoes fit just as expected, and are extremely comfortable. I have narrow feet and the laces allow me to tighten them to my width. The laces are long enough to be looser for anyone with wider feet, as well. Very happy with my purchase, and I will definitely buy Asics again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great work work; stand all day
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable, feels like your foot is in a pillow. i use them for work where i stand for 12-14 hours. i like the padding around the ankle. i bough them here because the price was nicer than on asics but the website does have more colors available. fit as expected. can't beat amazon prime and free returns
customer_reviews.author: valery

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: The picture was misleading, as I definitely got a pair that has bright pink and grey instead of orange, but I'm ok with this. These shoes are incredibly comfortable, even from the first wear, and super lightweight. They make working out so much easier, and I look good doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane A

customer_reviews.title: Best workout shoes I've ever owned! Flexible, lightweight, sturdy, fashionable, comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for circuit and cross-training. Very flexible and lightweight yet sturdy, fashionable yet comfortable. Total package -- so glad I bought these, they're the best workout shoes I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Alex

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes! These are probably the most comfortable cross-trainer shoe I have ever worn. They give me good support and cushion but still light weight and flexible. I have already purchased a second pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: CLK720

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor training!
customer_reviews.text: My true size is 5 and ordered 6 for these. With thick socks, the fit is good, but 5.5 (a half size up) might have been better. I like this light, breathable pair that I bought for Zumba! Regarding the color issue, other reviewers are right; it is pink, not pale orange.
customer_reviews.author: Miya

customer_reviews.title: The black and white is super cute. My 13yo daughter was upset I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The black and white is super cute. My 13yo daughter was upset I didn't get her a pair too! I wear a 9 1/2 in women's. I also have a narrower foot, specifically my heel. It is a little loose on my heel, but not anymore than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t really like them.. tongue was too small.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I didn’t like these as much as I thought I would. They just aren’t that comfortable. The tongue is tiny, and unless you have a super thin flat foot, the tongue barely covers the top of your foot they don’t even tuck in, which makes a gap on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: BrinDeeS

customer_reviews.title: Love these sneaks!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers. They’re perfect for cross-training. I wouldn’t necessarily say they are idea for long-distance running, but they’re perfect for short runs, weightlifting and general cardio. I have high arches and a high instep and these shoes hit me like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Megatron48

customer_reviews.title: I returned them!
customer_reviews.text: There is no support in the shoes. I ordered a pair in 6.5 and they are a little smaller than my other Size 6.5 sneakers. There is more pink in the actual color, which is not the same as the color shown on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Z

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy and hard on feet
customer_reviews.text: The shoe felt like I was walking on wood the first year i had them so I only wore them if I HAD to. And I am pretty sure these are not actual ASICS.
customer_reviews.author: BKloste1236

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my daughter. She loves them and uses it almost each day.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise good shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are pink pink! Picture looks orange but they are not orange at all... very pink!! Otherwise good shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Christina B.

customer_reviews.title: Great shows, but they run small. The seller was very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers run small, but they seem very good. I have a 7.5 in regular shows, but tent to get an 8 for sneakers. I would have needed an 8.5. I returned it and MEDICALUNIFORMS was very helpful in guiding me with a couple of issues I encountered in the process. Too bad they did not work, but they made the return process easy and succesful.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio Madera Holgado

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I need to return these shoes as they are a full size too large. I own other Asics in a size 7 that fit perfectly but these are really big shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Amdur

customer_reviews.title: Love these so far!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so far! They fit great and work well for my indoor circuit training workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes got for jazzercise needed a hi-impact shoes these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna h

customer_reviews.title: Like these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Like these sneaks, could use a little more arch support for my feet
customer_reviews.author: Shannon D. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy, good for quick cuts
customer_reviews.text: Got these for dek hockey and they’re awesome! The elastics that gold the laces look a little like they could snap but only time will tell!
customer_reviews.author: EmC

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting them to look like the pic
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting them to look like the pic. Instead of Orange, they came bright pink!! Also toe box is tight. I am a Size 8 and always order an 8.5 in every Asics l have ever ordered. This feels like an 8. Other than that the 1 star is because they are lightweight and feels like they would be comfortable, had they been the right fit.
customer_reviews.author: Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I knew I needed a size/half size bigger in this brand and ordered accordingly, fit great!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Love these for a variety of workout types indoors
customer_reviews.text: Love these for a variety of workout types indoors. They fit well, are comfortable, and there was no break-in period. Will buy these again. Orange is closer to hot pink, but not obnoxious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but the style and fit is very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Not much padding in the sole, but the style and fit is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kurka

customer_reviews.title: Best training shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for training! These are my second pair and I would buy them every single time if I could! Just hard to find!
customer_reviews.author: Dorelle Archambeau

customer_reviews.title: Love asics, but not these
customer_reviews.text: Love asics, but not these. They're a little stiff even after multiple uses, and definitely not as comfortable as my asics running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nbrim

customer_reviews.title: These fit as expected and are comfortable and super lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected and are comfortable and super lightweight. I use them for HIIT workouts and weightlifting. I would not recommend them for distance running as they are not super supportive.
customer_reviews.author: KateT03

customer_reviews.title: Best sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of ASICS, and these are my favorite pair so far. A light sneaker that doesn’t sacrifice any support!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jordan

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love. These are light weight but very supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... little thicker than I expected but overall I really like this shoe
customer_reviews.text: The sole was a little thicker than I expected but overall I really like this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Pelley

customer_reviews.title: Ordered these on line and I love them. I do a lot of boot camp ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these on line and I love them. I do a lot of boot camp and they are perfect for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth E Kwiatkowski Nestle Purina

customer_reviews.title: Bought Second Pair
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I have owned. Great fit, comfortable and cute design!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: very light, as I expected, somewhat small but ...
customer_reviews.text: very light, as I expected, somewhat small but maybe it is matter of socks but next time I am planning to buy 8 size instead 7,5
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rojas Gomez

customer_reviews.title: I really like the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shoes, the fit is great and they are really comfortable. I work in a hospital so I'm on my feet all day but please pay attention to the color documented because they don't look ANYTHING like the picture. The picture is peachy looking but the shoes are highlighter pink. Just something to be aware of!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the look but they were a little narrow for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey cordes

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Supportive
customer_reviews.text: I only wear ASICS. When it came time to buy my next pair, I was a bit apprehensive to purchase online without trying them on. They fit true to size and are so light weight. They are comfortable and supportive. I use them for running, weight lifting, conditioning training (HIIT), and Insanity DVDs.
customer_reviews.author: c.smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, I wear them at work all day and they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Ahearn

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed with cheap looking material
customer_reviews.text: Liteweight material, however poorly constructed. There was still a gap between the tongue and sides of the shoe when I laced it up tightly. Provides very little support as the material of the shoe is very soft. Also, looks kind of cheap for the price that you are paying...might as well spend a few more bucks for Nike trainers. I'll be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Time Shopper

customer_reviews.title: It was a great fitting/great feeling shoe
customer_reviews.text: It was a great fitting/great feeling shoe, but the color was completely different than the picture. The grays were darker and while it appears to be a soft type of orange/pink in the picture it is actually neon red in person. I had to return them because I didn't like the color.
customer_reviews.author: lilmargy

customer_reviews.title: Got lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and cute, order a half size larger than normal
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: I love them! I did read review about them running ...
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I did read review about them running a little bit smaller so I order 1/2 size bigger and the fit prefect! I workout hard 4-5 days a week sometimes two-a-days and they are awesome. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Shantel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but I was expecting them to look like ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, but I was expecting them to look like the picture, no pink fluorescent. You should change the advertisement photo, this is misleading advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiani Machado de Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: The shoe length is as expected for Asics. I ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe length is as expected for Asics. I just didn't know that it would be so tight around the toe and arch (with elastic) which ended up causing me foot pain (Morton's Neuroma).
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as flexible as i would have thought. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor Single Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great gym shoe
customer_reviews.text: I brought these on vacation and walked 10+ miles in them daily. They are super comfortable and cute, and true to size. Perfect for cross-training too. I wasn't expecting the silver reflective layer in the sole but it looks all right. ASICS are great.
customer_reviews.author: N Olmeda

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy these because i wasnt to familiar with the brand but i am very glad i did, these shoes are extremely comfortable and well made!
customer_reviews.author: Heather.Renay

product_meta.title: ASICS Women's Gel-fit Yui Cross-Trainer Shoe
product_meta.description: The Gel-Fit Yui Shoe has been specially designed for the studio athlete and carefully designed to improve the underfoot while maintaining structure and support. The fully integrated fit system allows the heel collar to wrap tightly around the foot and thus provides an individual feeling.
feature_bullets: REAR FOOT GEL CUSHIONING SYSTEM: absorbs shocks during impact and allows a smooth transition to the middle.
AHAR Outsole: Acronym for ASICS High Abrasion Rubber. Placed in critical areas of the outsole for exceptional durability.
